column9: Allows article authoring from the Web browser. Inline annotations can be created by anyone using their choice of CC license. Inline citations can be created (eg fragment of text in the current article can cite (with a specific semantics) another fragment of text in another article elsewhere on the Web. Notifications are sent for various interactions (sharing, annotations, citations). Flexibility to "save as" anyhwere on the Web with available credentials.
column23: Native ReadWriteWeb software. Implements W3C specifications: Web Annotation, Linked Data Notifications, ActivityPub, Activity Streams 2.0. Employs WebID+TLS, Web access control list and compliant with Linked Data Platform. Articles and annotations can be assigned with a Creative Commons license. Allows inline semantic citations. Its source codeuses the Apache License, Version 2.0.

column6: Online data capture for every medical researcher
column8:
Online data capture and data management tool for every medical researcher. Certified security for medical data. In 2011 there was no decent application for simple and 
affordable data management.

Biometrics Evaluation and Testing (BEAT). The BEAT platform is an European computing e-infrastructure for Open Science proposing a solution for open access, scientific information sharing and re-use including data and source code while protecting privacy and confidentiality. It allows easy online access to experimentation and testing in computational science. You define what data and modules you would like to use, we make sure the system runs and provides you with a result. Data from different experiments can be easily compared and searched. The platform also provides an attestation mechanism for your reports (scientific papers, technical documents or certifications).

Data Mining Fruitful and Fun. Open source machine learning and data visualization for novice and expert. Interactive data analysis workflows with a large toolbox. And addon framework. Drag and drop classifiers, network analyses and text analysis.
